title: Game Progress Route
content:
ot interfere. Do as you must. Choose your own way, Shadoeheart. You cannot allow your goddess to control you. Please, Shadowheart. Don't do this.

Choose the 4th option which will then lead you to the next choices:

All right. You have my support. This is wrong... but I can't afford to lose you. Do what you must. You want to fight? Fine.
